former_owner_as_recorded: The dean of Lu"kirch; Carthusians of Buxheim (cf. note on f. i verso), with "N. 175" in ink on f. 1 and on the spine; "386" also on the spine; Hugo, Graf von Waldbott-Basenheim (Munich, 20 Sept. 1883, lot 2616); Adolph Sutro (1830-1898), mayor of S. F.
former_owner_label: Dean of Lukirch;Buxheim Charterhouse;Hugo Philipp Waldbott-Bassenheim;Adolph Sutro
physical_description: Binding: Bound, s. XV, in red leather over boards bevelled on the outside, two fore edge clasps with straps closing to pins; design of a church on the clasps. Unidentified fragments of another manuscript as pastedowns and flyleaves.|Script, ff. 1-107v: Semi-cursive gothic.|Layout, ff. 1-107v: 29-34 long lines, frame ruled in lead.|Script, Pastedowns, flyleaves: Cursive gothic.|Layout, Pastedowns, flyleaves: 2 columns.
note: Bibliography: J. B. Schneyer, Repertorium der lateinischen Sermones des Mittelalters fu"r die Zeit von 1350 bis 1500(Mu"nster 1969-1990).|ff. 1-107v: As in J. B. Schneyer, Repertorium sermons: 2, 5, 6, 9, 17, 18, 21-26, ?, 28-45, 47-106, 108-110, 112-131, 133, 134, 136-141, 143-150, ?, ?, 152, 154, 156-159, 161-163, 165, 167, 169-172, 175, 178-182, 184, 193, 186-192, ?, ?.
